languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}破绽{/g}时，刺客接下来的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}会提高{uip|DamageBonus|abb1af6ec9944442b4d815aadfa61db8}%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加。

traits.locale_text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}破绽{/g}时，刺客接下来的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}会提高{uip|DamageBonus|abb1af6ec9944442b4d815aadfa61db8}%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加。
每当刺客{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}破绽时，刺客接下来的伤害会提高{uip|DamageBonus|abb1af6ec9944442b4d815aadfa61db8}%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加。

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g} aseste un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} en una {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}abertura{/g}, todo {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que inflija aumenta en un +{uip|DamageBonus|abb1af6ec9944442b4d815aadfa61db8} % hasta el final del combate. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|DamageBonus|abb1af6ec9944442b4d815aadfa61db8}% until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g} aseste un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} en una {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}abertura{/g}, todo {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que inflija aumenta en un +{uip|DamageBonus|abb1af6ec9944442b4d815aadfa61db8} % hasta el final del combate. Este efecto es acumulativo.

Cada vez que el asesino aseste un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} en una zona desprotegida, todo daño que inflija aumenta en un +{uip|DamageBonus|abb1af6ec9944442b4d815aadfa61db8} % hasta el final del combate. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassine{/g} eine {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}Blöße{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, wird der {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} des Assassinen bis zum Ende des Kampfes um + {uip|DamageBonus|abb1af6ec9944442b4d815aadfa61db8} % erhöht. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|DamageBonus|abb1af6ec9944442b4d815aadfa61db8}% until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassine{/g} eine {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}Blöße{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, wird der {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} des Assassinen bis zum Ende des Kampfes um + {uip|DamageBonus|abb1af6ec9944442b4d815aadfa61db8} % erhöht. Stapelbar.

Immer wenn der Assassine eine Blöße {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}trifft{/g}, wird der Schaden des Assassinen bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +{uip|DamageBonus|abb1af6ec9944442b4d815aadfa61db8}% erhöht. Wird aufaddiert.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} une {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}brèche{/g}, les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} qu'il inflige augmentent de +{uip|DamageBonus|abb1af6ec9944442b4d815aadfa61db8} % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|DamageBonus|abb1af6ec9944442b4d815aadfa61db8}% until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'Assassin {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touche{/g} une brèche, les dégâts qu'il inflige augmentent de +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g})</u> % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.
Chaque fois que l'Assassin {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touche{/g} une brèche, les dégâts qu'il inflige augmentent de +{uip|DamageBonus|abb1af6ec9944442b4d815aadfa61db8} % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}隙{/g}に攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}させると、戦闘終了までアサシンの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が{uip|DamageBonus|abb1af6ec9944442b4d815aadfa61db8}+%される。この効果は累積する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|DamageBonus|abb1af6ec9944442b4d815aadfa61db8}% until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: アサシンが隙に攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}させると、戦闘終了までアサシンのダメージが +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>%される。この効果は累積する。
アサシンが隙に攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}させると、戦闘終了までアサシンのダメージが +{uip|DamageBonus|abb1af6ec9944442b4d815aadfa61db8}%される。この効果は累積する。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Suikastçı{/g}, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}açıklığa{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g} saldırılarının {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} +%{uip|DamageBonus|abb1af6ec9944442b4d815aadfa61db8} kadar artar. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
